page.title: 08PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN
page.content: There are two playgroups in Abbots Bromley. This morning we went to the St. Nicholas playgroup and they are there from nine to twelve and at break they have milk orange and a biscuit. On sunny days they go for a walk in the church yard. There are twenty three children altogether but only fifteen are allowed to go at one time. In the winter they have hot chocolate and toast. The names are Natalie, Rebecca, Edward, Gary, Oliver, Lydia, Naomi, Charles, Catherine, Esther, Emily and the teachers are Gill and Debbie. For Christmas they have toast and hot chocolate.
